messages.title: Stable leadership for Brexit and beyond
messages.content: Prime Minister Theresa May asks country for support to strengthen hand in Brexit negotiations and to lock in Britain's economic progress.

messages.title: Getting on with the job
messages.content: Getting on with the job of securing the best possible deal from Brexit is the most important task the Government faces today.

messages.title: 3 Key Reasons Why a General Election is Needed Now
messages.content: 1. One-off chance now while EU Leaders agree stance. 2. We need to show unity as negotiations start, but Westminster is divided. 3. To lock in our economic progress so it can benefit the British people for the future.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Strong and stable leadership with Theresa May to secure future of the United Kingdom.
Ensuring best possible deal from Brexit negotiations.
A growing economy to secure our future.

issues.brexitEurope: Getting the best possible deal in Brexit negotiations, sign new trade deals around the world with new friends and old partners.
issues.economy: Growing economy to secure our future. Strong economy paying for a strong NHS.
issues.health: Strong economy paying for a strong NHS.

community.content: Every vote that is cast for me and my Conservative candidate in this general election will strengthen my hand at those negotiations.

leaflet.personalStatement: With your help, together we can make it work. We will: Take back control of our borders, our laws and our money. Sign new trade deals around the world with new friends and old partners. Ensure we leave in a smooth and orderly way, and that Brexit works for the whole of the United Kingdom.
